TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ProjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝一組相關的專案、其工具組、預設的全域屬性集，以及應該用於建置這些項目的記錄器。

span.span: Encapsulates a set of related projects, their toolsets, a default set of global properties, and the loggers that should be used to build them.

summary.span: 這個類別的全域版本會做為預設專案集合。

span.span: A global version of this class acts as the default project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式網域中，可以存在多個專案集合。Multiple project collections can exist within an app domain. 不過，這些必須不同時建置。However, these must not build concurrently.

summary.span: 建立不含全域屬性或記錄器的專案集合。

span.span: Creates a project collection with no global properties or loggers.

summary.span: 專案集合工具組會從組態檔和登錄進行初始化。

span.span: The project collection toolset is initialized from the configuration file and registry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立不含全域屬性或記錄器的專案集合。

span.span: Creates a project collection with no global properties or loggers.

summary.span: 專案集合工具組會從組態檔和登錄進行初始化。

span.span: The project collection toolset is initialized from the configuration file and registry.

param.name: toolsetLocations

span.span: The locations from which to load toolsets.

summary.span: 建立不含全域屬性或記錄器的專案集合。

span.span: Creates a project collection with no global properties or loggers.

summary.span: 專案集合工具組會從所指定位置的工具組初始化。

span.span: The project collection toolset is initialized from toolsets in the given locations.

Public Sub New (globalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String))

param.name: globalProperties
param.span: 要使用的預設全域屬性。

span.span: The default global properties to use.
May be null.

summary.span: 執行個體化專案集合，而該專案集合包含指定的全域屬性、不含記錄器，而且從組態檔和登錄讀取工具組資訊。

span.span: Instantiates a project collection with specified global properties, no loggers, and that reads toolset information from the configuration file and registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能會擲回 InvalidToolsetDefinitionException。May throw InvalidToolsetDefinitionException.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> globalProperties, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger> loggers, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ToolsetDefinitionLocations toolsetDefinitionLocations) cil managed

The loggers to register.
May be null.

param.name: toolsetDefinitionLocations
param.span: 從其中載入工具組的位置。

span.span: The locations from which to load toolsets.

summary.span: 執行個體化專案集合，而該專案集合包含指定的全域屬性和記錄器，而且使用指定的工具組位置。

span.span: Instantiates a project collection with specified global properties and loggers and using the specified toolset locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能會擲回 InvalidToolsetDefinitionException。May throw InvalidToolsetDefinitionException.

span.span: The maximum number of nodes to use for building.

param.span: 如果已設定為 true，則只會記錄重要事件。

span.span: If set to true, only critical events will be logged.

summary.span: 建立包含指定之全域屬性、記錄器、節點計數及 onlyLogCriticalEvents 值的專案集合。

span.span: Creates a project collection with specified global properties, loggers, node count, and onlyLogCriticalEvents value.

summary.span: 專案集合工具組會從所指定位置的工具組初始化。

span.span: The project collection toolset is initialized from toolsets in the given locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果保留的任何全域屬性，會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if any of the global properties are reserved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddToolset(class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Toolset toolset) cil managed

span.span: The toolset to be added.

summary.span: 將新工具組加入至專案集合中。

span.span: Adds a new toolset to the project collection.

summary.span: 取代具有相同工具版本的任何現有工具組。

span.span: Replaces any existing toolset with the same tools version.

Public Function ContainsToolset (toolsVersion As String) As Boolean

span.span: The tools version to search for.

summary.span: 判斷已針對指定的工具版本定義工具組。

span.span: Determines whether a toolset is defined for the given tools version.

returns.span: 如果已針對指定的工具版本定義工具組，則傳回 true，否則傳回 false。

span.span: Returns true if there is a toolset defined for the given tools version; false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前已載入此集合中的專案數目。

span.span: Gets the number of projects currently loaded into this collection.

value.span: 傳回目前已載入此集合中的專案數目。

span.span: Returns the number of projects currently loaded into this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得此專案集合的預設工具版本。

span.span: Gets the default tools version of this project collection.

value.span: 傳回此專案集合的預設工具版本 (一律已定義)。

span.span: Returns the default tools version of this project collection, which is always defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此預設值取自.exe.config 檔案，從系統登錄中，或如果兩者都存在時，從硬式編碼的工具版本"2.0"。This default value is obtained from the .exe.config file, from the system registry, or if neither is present, from the hard-coded tools version "2.0". Set 方法會擲回 InvalidOperationException 如果工具組提供的工具版本尚未定義。The set method throws InvalidOperationException if a toolset with the provided tools version has not been defined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableMarkDirty { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷 是否暫時在此集合中的專案上停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether is temporarily disabled on projects in this collection.

summary.span: 舉例來說，此屬性可以在專案未標記為已變更因而要進行重新評估的情況下，設定全域屬性。

span.span: This allows, for example, a global properties to be set without projects getting marked dirty for reevaluation as a consequence.

value.span: 傳回旗標，這個旗標會判斷 是否暫時停用。

span.span: Returns a flag that determines whether is temporarily disabled.

summary.span: 釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種資源。

span.span: Releases both managed and unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 當主機不再需要專案集合時予以呼叫。

span.span: Called when a host no longer needs the project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種資源。

span.span: Releases both managed and unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 當主機不再需要專案集合時予以呼叫。

span.span: Called when a host no longer needs the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject() ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。 」In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject() before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope."

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果為 true，則釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種資源，否則只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: If true, releases both managed and unmanaged resources; otherwise releases only unmanaged resources..

summary.span: 釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種資源。

span.span: Releases both managed and unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 當主機不再需要專案集合時予以呼叫。

span.span: Called when a host no longer needs the project collection..

summary.span: 關閉專案集合所擁有的任何記錄服務，並釋放記錄器執行緒。

span.span: Shuts down any logging services that the project collection owns and releases the logger thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遵循.NET 記憶體回收處置指導方針。Follows the garbage disposal guidelines of .NET.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string unescapedString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (unescapedString As String) As String

span.span: The string to be converted.

summary.span: 將字串中的特殊字元轉換成 MSBuild 逸出格式。

span.span: Converts special characters in a string to MSBuild escape format.
Returns the converted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，"%3b"for";"。For example, "%3b" for ";". 會轉換為 MSBuild 剖析極為重要的字元。Only characters that are especially significant to MSBuild parsing are converted. 呼叫端可以使用這個方法，使安全會擴充它的其他方法來剖析字串。Callers can use this method to make a string safe to be parsed by other methods that would otherwise expand it. 呼叫端也可以使用這個方法將字串寫入專案檔的安全。Callers can also use this method to make a string safe to be written to a project file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Execution.ProjectPropertyInstance GetGlobalProperty(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetGlobalProperty (name As String) As ProjectPropertyInstance

span.span: The name of the property to be retrieved.

summary.span: 從專案集合中取得具有指定之名稱的任何全域屬性。

span.span: Get any global property on the project collection that has the specified name.

returns.span: 從專案集合中傳回具有指定之名稱的任何全域屬性，否則傳回 Null。

span.span: Returns any global property on the project collection that has the specified name; otherwise returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project> GetLoadedProjects(string fullPath) cil managed

param.name: fullPath
param.span: 要比對之專案檔的路徑。

span.span: The path to a project file to be matched.

summary.span: 取得所有具有與所指定路徑相符之專案路徑的專案。

span.span: Gets all projects whose project path matches the given path.

returns.span: 傳回所有具有與所指定路徑相符之專案路徑的專案。

span.span: Returns all projects whose project path matches the given path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為專案也區分的全域屬性和/或工具版本，可能是一個以上的專案，以指定的路徑。There may be more than one project with the given path because projects are also distinguished by global properties and/or tools version.

value.span: 會從組態檔和登錄取得工具組資訊。

span.span: Toolset information is obtained from the configuration file and registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全執行緒。Thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ GlobalProperties { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 為此集合中的所有專案取得唯讀的預設全域屬性。

span.span: Gets the read-only default global properties for all projects in this collection.

value.span: 為此集合中的所有專案傳回唯讀的預設全域屬性。

span.span: Returns the read-only default global properties for all projects in this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和即可加入、 設定，以及移除全域屬性。Use and to add, set, and remove global properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ HostServices { Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Execution::HostServices ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，這個物件會在專案集合內含專案的建置期間為工作提供主機服務。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that provides host services to tasks during builds of projects contained in the project collection.
Returns the host services object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會傳回，這可能是 null。By default, returns , which may be null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsBuildEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性預設會選取是否可以建置專案集合中專案的目標和工作。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that selects by default whether the targets and tasks of projects in the project collection can be built.

value.span: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性預設會選取是否可以建置此專案集合中專案的目標和工作。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that selects by default whether the targets and tasks of projects in this project collection can be built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可基於安全性考量。Can be used for security purposes. 根據預設，新的專案具有相同 IsBuildEnabled 設定為包含它的父專案集合。By default, a new project has the same IsBuildEnabled setting as the parent project collection that contains it. 當 IsBuildEnabled 為 false 時，此專案的建置方法將會失敗。When IsBuildEnabled is false, the Build method on this project fails.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LoadedProjects As ICollection(Of Project)

summary.span: 取得目前已載入這個集合中的所有專案。

span.span: Gets all the projects currently loaded into this collection.

value.span: 傳回目前已載入這個集合中的所有專案。

span.span: Returns all the projects currently loaded into this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個專案都有唯一組合的路徑、 全域屬性和工具版本。Each project has a unique combination of path, global properties, and tools version.

summary.span: 從指定之專案檔中的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code in the given project file.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以此專案集合的全域屬性和工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the global properties and tools version of this project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(string fileName) cil managed
Public Function LoadProject (fileName As String) As Project

span.span: The project file to evaluate.

summary.span: 從指定之專案檔中的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code in the given project file.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以此專案集合的全域屬性和工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the global properties and tools version of this project collection.

returns.span: 如果集合中的現有專案已經從指定的專案檔進行評估，則會傳回現有專案。

span.span: If an existing project in the collection has already been evaluated from the given project file, the existing project is returned.

returns.span: 否則會建立專案、評估專案、將專案加入至專案集合，以及傳回專案。

span.span: Otherwise, a new project is created, evaluated, added to the project collection, and returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(class System.Xml.XmlReader xmlReader) cil managed

param.name: xmlReader
param.span: 要從其中讀取專案原始程式碼的 XML 讀取器。

span.span: Xml reader to read project source code from.

summary.span: 從指定之 XML 讀取器讀取的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code read from the given XML reader.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以此專案集合的全域屬性和工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the global properties and tools version of this project collection.
Returns the new project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案或給定的專案根目錄提供給專案檔的完整路徑時，專案會加入至這個專案集合。The project is added to this project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to a project file. 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject (string fileName, string toolsVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(string fileName, string toolsVersion) cil managed
Public Function LoadProject (fileName As String, toolsVersion As String) As Project
public: Microsoft::Build::Evaluation::Project ^ LoadProject(System::String ^ fileName, System::String ^ toolsVersion);

span.span: The project file to evaluate.
The tools version to use.
May be null.

summary.span: 從讀取自指定之專案檔的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code read from the given project file.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以此專案集合的全域屬性和指定的工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the global properties of this project collection and the given tools version.

returns.span: 如果集合中的現有專案已經從指定的專案檔進行評估，而且具有指定的工具版本，則會傳回現有專案。

span.span: If an existing project in the collection has already been evaluated from the given project file, and with the given tools version, then the existing project is returned.

returns.span: 否則會建立專案、評估專案、將專案加入至專案集合，以及傳回專案。

span.span: Otherwise, a new project is created, evaluated, added to the project collection, and returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject (System.Xml.XmlReader xmlReader, string toolsVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(class System.Xml.XmlReader xmlReader, string toolsVersion) cil managed
public: Microsoft::Build::Evaluation::Project ^ LoadProject(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ xmlReader, System::String ^ toolsVersion);

param.name: xmlReader
param.span: 要從其中讀取專案原始程式碼的 XML 讀取器。

span.span: Xml reader to read project source code from.
The tools version to use.
May be null.

summary.span: 從指定之 XML 讀取器讀取的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code read from the given XML reader.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以此專案集合的全域屬性和指定的工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the global properties of this project collection and the given tools version.
Returns the new project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案或給定的專案根目錄提供給專案檔的完整路徑時，專案會加入至這個專案集合。The project is added to this project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to a project file. 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject (string fileName, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> globalProperties, string toolsVersion);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(string fileName, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> globalProperties, string toolsVersion) cil managed
Public Function LoadProject (fileName As String, globalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), toolsVersion As String) As Project

public: Microsoft::Build::Evaluation::Project ^ LoadProject(System::String ^ fileName, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ globalProperties, System::String ^ toolsVersion);

span.span: The project file to be evaluated.

param.name: globalProperties

span.span: The global properties to use.

param.span: 可能是 Null，如此將使用包含的專案集合全域屬性。

span.span: May be null, in which case the containing project collection's global properties will be used.
The tools version.
May be null.

summary.span: 從讀取自指定之專案檔的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code read from the given project file.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以指定的全域屬性和工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the given global properties and tools version.

returns.span: 如果集合中的現有專案已經從指定的專案檔進行評估，而且具有指定的全域屬性和工具版本，則會傳回現有專案。

span.span: If an existing project in the collection has already been evaluated from the given project file, and with the given global properties and tools version, then the existing project is returned.

returns.span: 否則會建立專案、評估專案、將專案加入至專案集合，以及傳回專案。

span.span: Otherwise, a new project is created, evaluated, added to the project collection, and returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject (System.Xml.XmlReader xmlReader, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> globalProperties, string toolsVersion);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project LoadProject(class System.Xml.XmlReader xmlReader, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> globalProperties, string toolsVersion) cil managed

public: Microsoft::Build::Evaluation::Project ^ LoadProject(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ xmlReader, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ globalProperties, System::String ^ toolsVersion);

param.name: xmlReader
param.span: 要從其中讀取專案的 XML 讀取器。

span.span: Xml reader to read project from

param.name: globalProperties

span.span: The global properties to use.

param.span: 可能是 null，如此將使用內含專案集合的全域屬性。

span.span: May be null in which case the containing project collection's global properties will be used.
The tools version.
May be null.

summary.span: 從指定之 XML 讀取器讀取的原始程式碼評估專案。

span.span: Evaluates a project from the source code read from the given XML reader.

summary.span: 原始程式碼會以指定的全域屬性和工具版本加以評估。

span.span: The source code is evaluated with the given global properties and tools version.
Returns the new project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案或給定的專案根目錄提供給專案檔的完整路徑時，專案會加入至這個專案集合。The project is added to this project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to a project file. 在具有.Net 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 傳遞 MSBuild 版本中，您必須呼叫 UnloadProject ProjectCollection 超出範圍之前。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .Net 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Loggers As ICollection(Of ILogger)

summary.span: 取得所有可讓這個集合中的專案用於進行建置的記錄器。

span.span: Gets all loggers that projects in this collection can use for their builds.

value.span: 傳回所有可讓這個集合中的專案用於進行建置的記錄器。

span.span: Returns all loggers that projects in this collection can use for their builds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入的記錄器方法。Loggers are added with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OnlyLogCriticalEvents { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數，這個參數會判斷是否只記錄重要事件，例如警告和錯誤。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that determines whether only critical events such as warnings and errors are logged.

value.span: 如果為 true，則只會記錄警告和錯誤等重要事件，否則為 false。

span.span: If true, only critical events such as warnings and errors are logged; false otherwise.

summary.span: 在專案加入至這個專案集合的 ProjectRootElementCache 時引發的事件。

span.span: Event that is fired when a project is added to the ProjectRootElementCache of this project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ProjectChanged As EventHandler(Of ProjectChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 直接變更此執行個體包含的 時引發。

span.span: Raised when a contained by this instance is directly changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過建構模型直接專案 XML 變更不會引發這個事件。This event is NOT raised for direct project XML changes via the construction model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ProjectCollectionChanged As EventHandler(Of ProjectCollectionChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 此執行個體的狀態變更時引發。

span.span: Raised when state is changed on this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將個別專案中的變更不會引發這個事件。This event is NOT raised for changes in individual projects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ProjectXmlChanged As EventHandler(Of ProjectXmlChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 變更此執行個體包含的 時引發。

span.span: Raised when a contained by this instance is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全域屬性，變更或不會實際變更 XML 的任何其他變更，不會引發這個事件。This event is NOT raised for changes to global properties, or any other change that doesn't actually dirty the XML.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RegisterForwardingLoggers(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Build.Logging.ForwardingLoggerRecord> remoteLoggers) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterForwardingLoggers (remoteLoggers As IEnumerable(Of ForwardingLoggerRecord))

span.span: The remote loggers to add.
May be null.

summary.span: 將指定的遠端記錄器加入至遠端記錄器集合，而該遠端記錄器集合用於建置此集合中的專案。

span.span: Adds the given remote loggers to the collection of remote loggers used for builds of projects in this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RegisterLogger(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger logger) cil managed

span.span: The logger to add.

summary.span: 將指定的記錄器加入至記錄器集合，而該記錄器集合用於建置此集合中的專案。

span.span: Adds the given logger to the collection of loggers used for builds of projects in this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記錄器物件已經在集合中，如果沒有任何作用。If the logger object is already in the collection, does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RegisterLoggers(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger> loggers) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterLoggers (loggers As IEnumerable(Of ILogger))

span.span: The loggers to be added.
May be null.

summary.span: 將指定的記錄器加入至記錄器集合，而該記錄器集合用於建置此集合中的專案。

span.span: Adds the given loggers to the collection of loggers used for builds of projects in this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 略過任何已在集合中的記錄器物件。Skips any logger objects that are already in the collection.

span.span: Removes all toolsets from the project collection.

span.span: Removes a global property from the set of default global properties.

returns.span: 如果全域屬性在移除前存在，則傳回 true，否則傳回 false。

span.span: Returns true if the global property is present before removal; false otherwise.

Public Function RemoveToolset (toolsVersion As String) As Boolean

span.span: The toolset to be removed.

span.span: Removes a toolset from the project collection.

returns.span: 如果工具組在移除前存在，則傳回 true，否則傳回 false。

span.span: Returns true if the toolset is present before removal; false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetGlobalProperty (string name, string value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetGlobalProperty(string name, string value) cil managed
Public Sub SetGlobalProperty (name As String, value As String)
public: void SetGlobalProperty(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ value);

param.name: name
param.span: 要加入或設定之預設全域屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the default global property to be added or set.
The new value of the default global property.

summary.span: 設定預設全域屬性集中之屬性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a property in the default set of global properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找到相符的屬性，此屬性是建立並初始化使用指定的值。If no matching property is found, the property is created and initialized with the given value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SkipEvaluation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷 ReevaluateIfNecessary 是否暫時在此集合中的專案上停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag the determines whether ReevaluateIfNecessary is temporarily disabled on projects in this collection.

summary.span: 當主機預計對專案進行大量的讀取和寫入，而且想為了效能而暫時犧牲正確性時，這個屬性很有用。

span.span: This is useful when the host expects to make a number of reads and writes to projects, and wants to temporarily sacrifice correctness for performance.

value.span: 傳回旗標，這個旗標會判斷 ReevaluateIfNecessary 是否暫時停用。

span.span: Returns a flag the determines whether ReevaluateIfNecessary is temporarily disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ToolsetLocations As ToolsetDefinitionLocations

span.span: Gets the locations used to find the toolsets.

value.span: 傳回用於尋找工具組的位置。

span.span: Returns the locations used to find the toolsets.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Toolsets As ICollection(Of Toolset)

summary.span: 取得此專案集合可用的工具組。

span.span: Gets the toolsets available to this project collection.

value.span: 傳回此專案集合可用的工具組。

span.span: Returns the toolsets available to this project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryUnloadProject(class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement projectRootElement) cil managed

param.name: projectRootElement
param.span: 要卸載之專案的根項目。

span.span: The root element of the project to unload.

summary.span: 嘗試從集合中移除專案。

span.span: Attempts to remove a project from the collection.

returns.span: 如果專案檔已卸載，則傳回 true。

span.span: Returns true if the project was unloaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Unescape(string escapedString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unescape (escapedString As String) As String

span.span: The string to be converted.

summary.span: 將字串中的逸出字元轉換成具有特別意義的 MSBuild 字元。

span.span: Converts escaped characters in a string to MSBuild characters with special meaning.
Returns the converted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，"%3b"會轉換成 「; 」。For example, "%3b" is converted to ";".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadAllProjects() cil managed

summary.span: 移除此專案集合中的所有專案。

span.span: Removes all projects in this project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不再需要專案時，主應用程式應該呼叫這個方法。The host should call this method when it no longer needs the projects.

summary.span: 從專案根項目快取中移除專案根項目。

span.span: Removes a project root element from the project root cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadProject(class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement projectRootElement) cil managed

span.span: The project root element to unload.

summary.span: 從專案根項目快取中移除專案根項目。

span.span: Removes a project root element from the project root cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用的狀況下，主機才會知道，已經移除使用這個根元素的所有專案，且應該會捨棄任何未儲存的變更。This method is useful for the case where the host knows that all projects using this root element have been removed, and that any unsaved changes should be discarded.

exception.span: 如果要卸載的專案根項目仍由已載入的專案或其匯入項目使用中，則會擲回。

span.span: Thrown if the project root element to unload is still in use by a loaded project or its imports.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadProject(class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project project) cil managed

span.span: The project to remove.

summary.span: 從專案集合中移除指定的專案。

span.span: Removes the given project from the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不再需要專案時，主應用程式應該呼叫這個方法。The host should call this method when it no longer needs the project. 如果指定的專案不存在專案集合中，會擲回 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if the given project is not present in the project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnregisterAllLoggers() cil managed

summary.span: 從記錄器集合中移除所有記錄器，而此集合中的專案建置會使用該記錄器集合。

span.span: Removes all loggers from the collection of loggers used by project builds in this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Version As Version
public: static property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含 MSBuild 引擎之組件檔的檔案版本。

span.span: Gets the file version of the assembly file that contains the MSBuild engine.

value.span: 傳回包含 MSBuild 引擎之組件檔的檔案版本。

span.span: Returns the file version of the assembly file that contains the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 Windows 的檔案版本 （特別是值的 ProductVersion 資源），而不一定是組件版本。This is the Windows file version (specifically the value of the ProductVersion resource), which is not necessarily the assembly version. 若要取得組件版本，請使用 Constants.AssemblyVersion。To obtain the assembly version, use Constants.AssemblyVersion.
